stories.title: Emails from the Apple vs. Epic trial (2021)

stories.text:
KYC has long left the financial sector, it is now virtually behind every website. We are getting policed by our peers who arent police. We get locked out of our accounts for using protonmail and a VPN. It's turning into china really.

Some wonder why Google Search is so bad lately. Well wonder not anymore, the answer had 3 letters: K, Y and C. Google Search tries to give you KYC-ed websites of course and conveniently, websites with ads are KYC-ed.

I wonder what do you think about KYC. Im generally not a crusader but it seems to me that regulation is absolutely insane.

Should KYC go?
stories.title: Poll: Do you want KYC gone?

stories.text:
https://www.unian.net/war/okkupanty-popali-v-pervyy-energoblok-zaporozhskoy-aes-video-novosti-donbassa-11728252.html

Russian invaders got into the first power unit of the Zaporizhzhya NPP.

This was stated by the representative of the press service of the station Andrey Tuz.

Rescuers cannot begin the elimination of the fire, because they are shot point-blank.

"A fire at the Zaporizhia NPP! Firefighters cannot get to the place of ignition and eliminate the consequences - they shoot point-blank. There is already a hit in the first power unit," Tuz said.

Information about the violation of the background radiation is not yet available.

That is, Russian President Vladimir Putin, in fact, has already begun a nuclear war, which the West was so afraid of. Now the latter should finally start to act.

Earlier, a spokesman for the Zaporozhye nuclear power plant recorded a video message in which he stated that Russia was firing at the nuclear power plant. Later it became known that the Zaporozhye NPP was on fire.
stories.title: Fire at Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant (The plant is larger than Chernobyl)
